translation: あちゃー{#Name="セント"}
source: あちゃー{#Name="セント"}

translation: せっかく竜種を捕獲したのにぃぃいぃ{#Name="セント"}
source: せっかく竜種を捕獲したのにぃぃいぃ{#Name="セント"}

translation: やっぱり私みたいに大局的にモノゴトを見られる人達ばっかりじゃないかぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}
source: やっぱり私みたいに大局的にモノゴトを見られる人達ばっかりじゃないかぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: どうしても自分が出来る程度の事は人に期待しちゃうんだよなぁあぁあ{#Name="セント"}
source: どうしても自分が出来る程度の事は人に期待しちゃうんだよなぁあぁあ{#Name="セント"}

translation: むしろ私レベルの人は逆に少ないと思った方がいいんだろうなあぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}
source: むしろ私レベルの人は逆に少ないと思った方がいいんだろうなあぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: 期待しすぎちゃうのは良くない癖だなぁあぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}
source: 期待しすぎちゃうのは良くない癖だなぁあぁあぁ{#Name="セント"}

translation: なんかムカツクんですけどぉ？{#Name="ディト"}
source: なんかムカツクんですけどぉ？{#Name="ディト"}

translation: トウの、使徒だな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: トウの、使徒だな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ……{#Name="セント"}
source: ……{#Name="セント"}

translation: 死んでもらおうか？{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 死んでもらおうか？{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: これで……{#Name="セント"}
source: これで……{#Name="セント"}

translation: 状況が悪化した{#Name="セント"}
source: 状況が悪化した{#Name="セント"}

translation: そんな事も判らない、バカ共が{#Name="セント"}
source: そんな事も判らない、バカ共が{#Name="セント"}

translation: 縁なき衆生とは……この事か{#Name="セント"}
source: 縁なき衆生とは……この事か{#Name="セント"}

translation: 何を言って……{#Name="デカート"}
source: 何を言って……{#Name="デカート"}

translation: ゼロ{#Name="セント"}
source: ゼロ{#Name="セント"}

translation: いつか、その竜が貴様に災いをもたらすぞ{#Name="セント"}
source: いつか、その竜が貴様に災いをもたらすぞ{#Name="セント"}

translation: そうなってから後悔するなよ……裏切りのウタウタイ……{#Name="セント"}
source: そうなってから後悔するなよ……裏切りのウタウタイ……{#Name="セント"}

translation: ゼロッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロッ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: 昼寝には丁度いい時間だな！{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: 昼寝には丁度いい時間だな！{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 違うよ！つかまってるんだよ！つかまってるんだよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: 違うよ！つかまってるんだよ！つかまってるんだよ！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: わかってるさ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: わかってるさ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ゼロ～！助けて～！{#Name="ミハイル"}
source: ゼロ～！助けて～！{#Name="ミハイル"}

translation: ああ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ああ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: ちっ……ゴーレムか{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: ちっ……ゴーレムか{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: Here comes trouble!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Here comes trouble!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: The personification of evil is here!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: The personification of evil is here!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Grant us strength!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Grant us strength!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Zero? Already!?{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Zero? Already!?{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Stay sharp or you're dead!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Stay sharp or you're dead!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Inform the first squadron she's arrived!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Inform the first squadron she's arrived!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: She, sir?{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: She, sir?{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Zero! The dark blossom of death!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Zero! The dark blossom of death!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: GYAAAH!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: GYAAAH!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Calm down! It's just a flesh wound!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Calm down! It's just a flesh wound!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Charge! Chaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Charge! Chaaaarge!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Stand strong! We can win if we keep at it!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Stand strong! We can win if we keep at it!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: If we go down, we go down together!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: If we go down, we go down together!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Arrrgh... Grant...me....power...!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Arrrgh... Grant...me....power...!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: I'm gonna tear your demonic ass in half!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: I'm gonna tear your demonic ass in half!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: All soldiers, commence counterattack!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: All soldiers, commence counterattack!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: It's like the rebirth of some dark power...{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: It's like the rebirth of some dark power...{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Where's Lady Two?{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Where's Lady Two?{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Last I heard, she was headed for the shrine, with Cent!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Last I heard, she was headed for the shrine, with Cent!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: Good. Then we must stop Zero here!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Good. Then we must stop Zero here!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Lady Two is our shining sun. Without our sun, we're nothing!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Lady Two is our shining sun. Without our sun, we're nothing!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: The dragon's so strong!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: The dragon's so strong!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: A dragon-taming Intoner? Don't be absurd!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: A dragon-taming Intoner? Don't be absurd!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Our rear guard is weakened!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Our rear guard is weakened!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Casualties are mounting everywhere!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Casualties are mounting everywhere!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: No retreat, soldiers! The penalty for retreat is death!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: No retreat, soldiers! The penalty for retreat is death!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Who does she think she is? WHO THE HELL DOES SHE THINK SHE IS??{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Who does she think she is? WHO THE HELL DOES SHE THINK SHE IS??{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Hey, watch where you swing that thing! You're gonna kill one of US!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Hey, watch where you swing that thing! You're gonna kill one of US!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Rescue Mikhail.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Rescue Mikhail.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemy soldiers!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the enemies blocking your way!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Alpha Sandwolves!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Alpha Sandwolves!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Golem!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Golem!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Man, I'm thirsty as hell.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Man, I'm thirsty as hell.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Ho ho ho. A shame. We're not apt{LF}to find water in this place.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Ho ho ho. A shame. We're not apt{LF}to find water in this place.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: If we have to keep fighting like this,{LF}I'm gonna keel over!{#Name="Dito"}
source: If we have to keep fighting like this,{LF}I'm gonna keel over!{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Indeed, it saps my strength as well.{LF}...Though not my man strength!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Indeed, it saps my strength as well.{LF}...Though not my man strength!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Goddamn, these wolves are annoying!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Goddamn, these wolves are annoying!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Wolves can sense the murderous{LF}intent of their foes...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Wolves can sense the murderous{LF}intent of their foes...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: What? You saying I'm not hiding{LF}my "murderous intent" enough!?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What? You saying I'm not hiding{LF}my "murderous intent" enough!?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: J-Just that we should remain calm, or—{LF}See? Now there's more of them!{#Name="Decadus"}
source: J-Just that we should remain calm, or—{LF}See? Now there's more of them!{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: {#Name="デカート"}
source: {#Name="デカート"}

translation: This is all that stupid dragon's fault, isn't it?{#Name="Dito"}
source: This is all that stupid dragon's fault, isn't it?{#Name="Dito"}

translation: He gets himself taken, and then{LF}you get all crazy with rage...{#Name="Dito"}
source: He gets himself taken, and then{LF}you get all crazy with rage...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: I'm not crazy with rage because of him...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm not crazy with rage because of him...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: This is just my normal, everyday rage.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This is just my normal, everyday rage.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh, really.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Oh, really.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You don't believe me?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You don't believe me?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I didn't say that...{#Name="Dito"}
source: I didn't say that...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You really do want to die, don't you?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You really do want to die, don't you?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My throat's on fire here.{#Name="Zero"}
source: My throat's on fire here.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! Perhaps a sweet kiss{LF}can quench those flames!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! Perhaps a sweet kiss{LF}can quench those flames!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And then afterwards, I could clear{LF}some sand from the lion's den, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}
source: And then afterwards, I could clear{LF}some sand from the lion's den, mmm?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Another word and I'll cut you down.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Another word and I'll cut you down.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Those bastards! Attacking{LF}Lady Two while she's ill!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Those bastards! Attacking{LF}Lady Two while she's ill!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: We fight for Lady Two, serene{LF}whisper of the spring!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: We fight for Lady Two, serene{LF}whisper of the spring!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: We must hold out until she recovers!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: We must hold out until she recovers!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: Ngh! So strong!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Ngh! So strong!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: No bellyaching! You can't{LF}serve Lady Two like that!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: No bellyaching! You can't{LF}serve Lady Two like that!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Is Lady Two safe!?{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Is Lady Two safe!?{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: I don't know! But I think{LF}she's with Cent, at least!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: I don't know! But I think{LF}she's with Cent, at least!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: 来やがれ、呪われし黒き花！{#Name="兵士"}
source: 来やがれ、呪われし黒き花！{#Name="兵士"}

translation: 俺がオマエを止めてやる！{#Name="兵士"}
source: 俺がオマエを止めてやる！{#Name="兵士"}

translation: We'll stop her here!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: We'll stop her here!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Lady Two is ill... Let's show her what her cannoneers are made of!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: Lady Two is ill... Let's show her what her cannoneers are made of!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Yes, sir! Blessed be Lady Two!{#Name="Soldiers C/D/G"}
source: Yes, sir! Blessed be Lady Two!{#Name="Soldiers C/D/G"}

translation: Fire! Fire! Keep firing!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Fire! Fire! Keep firing!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: They're right there! Don't aim, just fire!{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: They're right there! Don't aim, just fire!{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier E"}
source: Yes, sir!{#Name="Soldier E"}

translation: Once you're loaded, fire at will!{#Name="Soldier C"}
source: Once you're loaded, fire at will!{#Name="Soldier C"}

translation: Locked and loaded!{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Locked and loaded!{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: よしッ。発砲！{#Name="兵士C"}
source: よしッ。発砲！{#Name="兵士C"}

translation: Confirmed strike!{#Name="Soldier F"}
source: Confirmed strike!{#Name="Soldier F"}

translation: Less confirming, more striking!{#Name="Soldier G"}
source: Less confirming, more striking!{#Name="Soldier G"}

translation: I've had it with these stupid-ass little toys...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I've had it with these stupid-ass little toys...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Come at me! You AND your damn flower!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: Come at me! You AND your damn flower!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: I'll cut you both down right here!{#Name="Soldier B"}
source: I'll cut you both down right here!{#Name="Soldier B"}

translation: Help...help me...{#Name="Soldier D"}
source: Help...help me...{#Name="Soldier D"}

translation: D-Damn... My leg...{#Name="Soldier A"}
source: D-Damn... My leg...{#Name="Soldier A"}

translation: MORE wolves!? This is getting ri-goddamn-diculous.{#Name="Zero"}
source: MORE wolves!? This is getting ri-goddamn-diculous.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You said it. Stupid furballs...{#Name="Dito"}
source: You said it. Stupid furballs...{#Name="Dito"}

translation: こんな砂漠でご苦労さまだな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: こんな砂漠でご苦労さまだな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: まったくだよ。誰も得しない戦いだよ、コレ{#Name="ディト"}
source: まったくだよ。誰も得しない戦いだよ、コレ{#Name="ディト"}

translation: Nnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Nnngh...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: You all right, Decadus?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You all right, Decadus?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Sand...in my eyes... Such exquisite pain...{#Name="Decadus"}
source: Sand...in my eyes... Such exquisite pain...{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yeah, you're all right.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, you're all right.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oh ho! We're almost there!{#Name="Octa"}
source: Oh ho! We're almost there!{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And despite the heat, I'm still ready for more...{#Name="Octa"}
source: And despite the heat, I'm still ready for more...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Dammit, why the hell are the wolves on HER side?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Dammit, why the hell are the wolves on HER side?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I don't think these are your everyday{LF}wild wolves, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}
source: I don't think these are your everyday{LF}wild wolves, my lady.{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Yeah, Freakshow's right. These guys{LF}are definitely trained.{#Name="Dito"}
source: Yeah, Freakshow's right. These guys{LF}are definitely trained.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: Whatever. If they're in my way,{LF}they're getting cut down!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Whatever. If they're in my way,{LF}they're getting cut down!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zero!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Nice place for a nap.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Nice place for a nap.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: No! They caught me! They caught me here, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: No! They caught me! They caught me here, okay?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: I can see that.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I can see that.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zerooo! Help meee!{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: Zerooo! Help meee!{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Yeah, yeah.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah, yeah.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Golems...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Golems...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So how is it exactly that you got{LF}kidnapped again? Where's your brain?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So how is it exactly that you got{LF}kidnapped again? Where's your brain?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: In my head!{LF}...It IS in my head, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: In my head!{LF}...It IS in my head, right?{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Forget it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Forget it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Lady Zero?{#Name="Octa"}
source: Lady Zero?{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Hmm?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Golems are infused with magic{LF}spells that give them life.{#Name="Octa"}
source: Golems are infused with magic{LF}spells that give them life.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: And?{#Name="Zero"}
source: And?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And said magic spells are always{LF}etched upon their bodies.{#Name="Octa"}
source: And said magic spells are always{LF}etched upon their bodies.{#Name="Octa"}

translation: So?{#Name="Zero"}
source: So?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Er, well, if you destroy the part of the body{LF}that contains the spell, perhaps the golem may...{#Name="Octa"}
source: Er, well, if you destroy the part of the body{LF}that contains the spell, perhaps the golem may...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Too much work. I'll just beat him to death.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Too much work. I'll just beat him to death.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I assumed that would be your response...{#Name="Octa"}
source: I assumed that would be your response...{#Name="Octa"}

translation: Oh, dear...{#Name="Cent"}
source: Oh, dear...{#Name="Cent"}

translation: And I here thought you'd be smart enough to stay away.{#Name="Cent"}
source: And I here thought you'd be smart enough to stay away.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Well, I suppose that's just the curse of being{LF}a big-picture kind of guy. Know what I mean?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Well, I suppose that's just the curse of being{LF}a big-picture kind of guy. Know what I mean?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I know my own abilities, and I just expect others to recognize them as well.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I know my own abilities, and I just expect others to recognize them as well.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Buuut, I guess that's asking too much of folks like you, now, isn't it?{#Name="Cent"}
source: Buuut, I guess that's asking too much of folks like you, now, isn't it?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I mean, why hold people to an ideal they can't possibly meet? Am I right?{#Name="Cent"}
source: I mean, why hold people to an ideal they can't possibly meet? Am I right?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: This guy's really startin' to piss me off.{#Name="Dito"}
source: This guy's really startin' to piss me off.{#Name="Dito"}

translation: You're Two's disciple, yeah?{#Name="Zero"}
source: You're Two's disciple, yeah?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Cent"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Should I kill you, too?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Should I kill you, too?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You see?{#Name="Cent"}
source: You see?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: Now we've gone from bad to worse.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Now we've gone from bad to worse.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: What?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: You people really are dense, you know that?{#Name="Cent"}
source: You people really are dense, you know that?{#Name="Cent"}

translation: I guess the universe simply can't help those who won't help themselves.{#Name="Cent"}
source: I guess the universe simply can't help those who won't help themselves.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: What are you trying to—{#Name="Decadus"}
source: What are you trying to—{#Name="Decadus"}

translation: Zero.{#Name="Cent"}
source: Zero.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: One of these days, that dragon is gonna be your downfall.{#Name="Cent"}
source: One of these days, that dragon is gonna be your downfall.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: And when that moment comes, it will be too late for regrets...traitor.{#Name="Cent"}
source: And when that moment comes, it will be too late for regrets...traitor.{#Name="Cent"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}
source: {06}>{#Name="Mikhail"}

translation: Zero defeated Three, but lost Mikhail to the disciple Cent in the process.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Zero defeated Three, but lost Mikhail to the disciple Cent in the process.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: The group headed for Cent's home in the Land of Sands to try and rescue the dragon…{#Name="Accord"}
source: The group headed for Cent's home in the Land of Sands to try and rescue the dragon…{#Name="Accord"}

translation: 左様。私めも性への情熱以外はカラカラでございます{#Name="オクタ"}
source: 左様。私めも性への情熱以外はカラカラでございます{#Name="オクタ"}

translation: ほら、狼が増えてきた！{#Name="デカート"}
source: ほら、狼が増えてきた！{#Name="デカート"}

translation: それ以上エロ口叩いたら殺すぞ{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: それ以上エロ口叩いたら殺すぞ{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: 性根の腐ったヤツらめ！{#Name="兵士B"}
source: 性根の腐ったヤツらめ！{#Name="兵士B"}

translation: た……助けて……{#Name="兵士"}
source: た……助けて……{#Name="兵士"}

translation: くそっ……足が……{#Name="兵士"}
source: くそっ……足が……{#Name="兵士"}

translation: また狼か……ウンザリだな{#Name="ゼロ"}
source: また狼か……ウンザリだな{#Name="ゼロ"}

translation: まったくだよ。吐き気がする{#Name="ディト"}
source: まったくだよ。吐き気がする{#Name="ディト"}
